definition: variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
ten (used in fractions, writing checks etc)/assorted/miscellaneous
suffix, used to form interrogative 什麼|什么[shen2 me5], what?, indefinite 這麼|这么[zhe4 me5] thus, etc

sentences.english: And why do we fall for it, year after year?
sentences.chinese: 而我们又为什么年复一年为之倾倒？

sentences.english: Why should cattle not graze near yew trees?
sentences.chinese: 为什么牛不在紫杉附近吃草？

sentences.english: Why should the wind do his bidding? The wind is just wind.
sentences.chinese: 为什么风要为他服务呢？，风就是风。

sentences.english: Why do they want all of this stuff?
sentences.chinese: 为什么他们想要以上这些东西？

sentences.english: You know how we always have those ‘aha’ moments in the shower?
sentences.chinese: 为什么我们总在洗澡时灵光一现？

sentences.english: Why on earth have Man Booker's publicists chosen the Groucho?
sentences.chinese: 布克奖的那些公关为什么会选择格劳乔这个鬼地方？
哈蒙德夫人问，“为什么谢我？”

sentences.english: Why can't we always say the solution is X = A inverse B?
sentences.chinese: 为什么“解为X=A逆，B”不总是正确？

sentences.english: Today, why is there no one to our class come from?
sentences.chinese: 今天为什么没有人到我们班来呢？

sentences.english: That is the reason he must change partners endlessly.
sentences.chinese: 这是为什么他会不断的更换伴侣。

sentences.english: But why these workingman 's clothes?What was the meaning of this?
sentences.chinese: 但是为什么穿这身工人服呢？

sentences.english: Why standest thou afar off, O LORD?
sentences.chinese: 耶和华阿，你为什么站在远处。

sentences.english: Why are GM foods potentially allergenic?
sentences.chinese: 为什么转基因食物可能会引起过敏？

sentences.english: Do you have ants in your pants? = Why are you fidgeting so much?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么这么坐立不安？

sentences.english: Why don't you wish on the gargoyle?
sentences.chinese: 你不为什么不向怪兽的滴水嘴许愿？

definition: dialectal equivalent of 為什麼|为什么[wei4 shen2 me5]
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
variant of 怎麼|怎么[zen3 me5]

particle indicating that a previously asked question is to be applied to the preceding word ("What about ...?", "And ...?")/particle for inquiring about location ("Where is ...?")/particle signaling a pause, to emphasize the preceding words and allow the listener time to take them on board ("ok?", "are you with me?")/(at the end of a declarative sentence) particle indicating continuation of a state or action/particle indicating strong affirmation
youngest/most junior/tiny/one (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers, esp. on telephone or in military)/one or ace on dice or dominoes/variant of 吆[yao1], to shout
like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case
so much/this much/how much?/this way/like this
is or isn't/yes or no/whether or not
